entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
